sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines

div.p: Tyrolean ski resort in the Paznaun Valley, in western Austria, 100 km (c. 60 miles) west-south-west of Innsbruck, at which the Schenkers regularly spent the summer months.

Schenker described the access to Galtür (vC 10, June 1, 1927):
Galtür in the Paznaun Valley, accessible by footpath from the Vorarlberg side, or (better) by automobile from Landeck (or Wiesberg).
Pupils and friends frequently visited them there during the summer.
